page.title: 13HOME LIFE
page.content: We interviewed a lady who had lived in the area all her life. She said that she would not change anything but that she did miss the buses. There used to be three buses a fortnight, one on Tuesday for Market Day in Tiverton and one every other Saturday. She said that everybody was dependant on cars these days. The lady's husband is a retired farm worker and the two of them used to meet up with most people from around the area at Church functions. She said that there are some younger families who have moved in but they are often out all day so they don't see them that much. The only thing she didn't like about the area was the noise from the low-flying aircraft going over to Chivenor Airbase.She liked everything else.
